summary: FRONT PASSENGER SEAT WEIGHT SENSOR MALFUNCTION.  THERE WAS NO INCIDENT/ACCIDENT.  AIRBAG SERVICE LIGHT CAME ON, REGULAR GARAGES COULDN'T DIAGNOSE PROBLEM, ONLY A HYUNDAI DEALER CAN READ THE CODE; ONCE IT WAS DETERMINED THAT WEIGHT SENSOR WAS NOT WORKING, APPARENTLY THE ONLY SOLUTION IS TO REPLACE THE ENTIRE PASSENGER SEAT ASSEMBLY, CANNOT REPLACE JUST THE SENSOR.
